channel.title: Squiggle on plusSixOne
channel.description: Recent content in Squiggle on plusSixOne

item.title: Squiggle Disagreement
item.author: jamesthomasday@gmail.com (James Day)
item.description: For those who follow me, I’m sure you are well aware of The Squiggle run by Max Barry. In recent years, Max has done some amazing work at combining a bunch of different Footy models in one place. He recently created an API and Rob and I have now integrated it into the latest version of fitzRoy. There is a lot of value at having this information available. I’m hoping to delve into that throughout the year.
